body_html:
I can't download the miniconda.sh during the process so I predownload it and put it under ~/.
So the miniconda.sh path is ~/miniconda.sh.
Then I change the Dockerfile a little bit.(delete a line)

RUN
chmod +x ~/miniconda.sh &&
~/miniconda.sh -b -p /opt/conda && \
rm ~/miniconda.sh &&
/opt/conda/bin/conda install conda-build &&
/opt/conda/bin/conda create -y --name pytorch-py35 python=3.5.2 numpy scipy ipython mkl&&
/opt/conda/bin/conda clean -ya
